title: Collaboration-Based Handball Training Program: Skill Acquisition and Sports Attitude Development in [Large-Scale] Contexts

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic handball rules and foundational physical education literacy
context.additional_context: Structure suitable for lifelong physical education programs targeting general citizens, requiring customized instruction considering participants' physical conditions and learning pace

learning_goals: Participants can perform basic handball skills (pass, shot, defensive stance) with 85% accuracy within six months
Improve team project execution abilities to at least the "Developing" stage on a 3-level evaluation scale (Basic-Developing-Advanced) through collaborative learning activities
Over 90% of participants express positive attitudes toward handball and willingness to continue participation in surveys
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
